effect.black-white: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
effect.black-2-white-2: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.

flavor_text.black-white: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
